faq.label: Questions
faq.title: Common questions.
faq.description: Everything you need to know about Vision3 and how it works.

generate.question: How does the AI generate thumbnails?
generate.answer: Our AI uses advanced machine learning models trained on millions of high-performing YouTube thumbnails. You provide a text prompt, and it generates visually compelling options optimized for click-through rates.

experience.question: Do I need any design experience?
experience.answer: Absolutely not! Vision3 is designed for creators of all skill levels. Our conversational interface means you just describe your vision, and the AI handles the design complexities.

edit.question: Can I edit the generated thumbnails?
edit.answer: Yes, you can make adjustments to colors, fonts, layouts, and add custom elements within our intuitive editor. The AI provides a strong starting point, and you have full creative control.

export.question: What export formats are available?
export.answer: You can export your thumbnails in various resolutions (HD, 4K) and formats (JPG, PNG) suitable for direct upload to YouTube and other social media platforms.

trial.question: Is there a free trial?
trial.answer: Yes, Vision3 offers a generous free tier that allows you to generate a limited number of thumbnails each month without needing a credit card. It's perfect for getting started!

brand.question: How does Vision3 ensure brand consistency?
brand.answer: Our platform allows you to upload brand assets and define style guidelines. The AI then incorporates these elements into every generated thumbnail, ensuring a consistent look and feel across your content.
